title: Daydream VR: Everything you need to know about Google's VR platform
description: ![]()Google Street View and Play Movies is also present, and there’s support fromUbisoft and Electronic Arts on the gaming front.## Daydream support and compatibilityWe’ve already run through the devices that support Daydream VR, but in moregeneral terms, the platform currently requires top-end Android smartphonesthat meet Google’s specifications.Google has also said it will enforce strict standards on the quality of thesensors and the speed of the display’s refresh rate.Google’s current Daydream VR hardware partners include: Samsung, HTC, LG,Xiaomi, Huawei, ZTE, Asus and Alcatel.**Related:[How to turn your smartphone into a VRheadse](https://www.trustedreviews.com/how-tos/how-to-turn-your-phone-into-a-vr-headset)t****Are you excited for standalone Google VR headsets?
